DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text area for information describing all surgical procedures performed as part of treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Text area for information describing all surgical procedures performed as part of treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A specialty in which manual or operative procedures are used in the treatment of disease, injuries, or deformities.

Concepts.definition: The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A specialty in which manual or operative procedures are used in the treatment of disease, injuries, or deformities._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A specialty in which manual or operative procedures are used in the treatment of disease, injuries, or deformities.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures.
